title: Some settings give this message for no apperant reason
body:
How to fix this, settings I used to be able to run are not working out.

Error: OOM when allocating tensor with shape[16,256,176,176] and type float on /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 by allocator GPU_0_bfc
         [[{{node model_4_1/conv2d_30/convolution}} = Conv2D[T=DT_FLOAT, _class=["loc:@gradients/model_4_1/conv2d_30/convolution_grad/Conv2DBackpropInput"], data_format="NCHW", dilations=[1, 1, 1, 1], padding="SAME", strides=[1, 1, 1, 1], use_cudnn_on_gpu=true, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0"](model_4_1/pixel_shuffler_7/NHWC, conv2d_30/kernel/read)]]
Hint: If you want to see a list of allocated tensors when OOM happens, add report_tensor_allocations_upon_oom to RunOptions for current allocation info.

         [[{{node add_19/_551}} = _Recv[client_terminated=false, recv_device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0", send_device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0", send_device_incarnation=1, tensor_name="edge_7329_add_19", tensor_type=DT_FLOAT, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0"]()]]
